name: Law Offices of Ledger & Associates
overview:
To protect the victim’s right and to answer their queries upon getting real justice from their respective cases is what Ledgerlaw Firm aim for. The Law Offices of Ledger & Associates was established so you will be guided properly in attaining justice for yourself or for your loved ones who suffer from injury caused by other people’s irresponsible act. Ledgerlaw is in lead to provide you with the most effective legal service so you will be getting the right compensation and claims entitled for a victim like you.

Ledger Law Firm, headed by Atty. Emery Ledger, provides legal representation on personal injury related cases. You can rely on the credibility and honest service of the whole legal counsel team. Atty. Ledger started helping many victims of personal injury cases in 1998.

Their main office of Ledger & Associate is at 5160 Birch Street Suite 100, Newport Beach, California. You can talk with our skilled lawyers as well, dial 800-300-0001 for free case evaluation.
